Join Jill Berger-Fiffy from Culbert Healthcare Solutions as she facilitates the Internal Medicine Round Table  #MGMA17-http://bit.ly/2wmOLqe
Finding top notch talent and business opportunities across the Country

Culbert Healthcare Solutions is a team of highly qualified professionals dedicated to serving the unique needs of healthcare organizations. We provide healthcare professionals with considerable experience in healthcare information technology and operations. Each member of our team has a proven track record for successfully leading organizations through Clinical Systems, Practice Management, Financial Systems and Billing Operations Implementation and Improvement projects. We are also an Epic Certified Partner.We are hiring! Please feel free to reach out in regards to career opportunities at tbagg@culberthealth.com

Orion Health is an energetic, vibrant, adventurous company with a global reach; we have staff, offices, and customers all over the world. Our award winning solutions are utilized by leading health organizations. Using the latest technologies to develop health software, we make a positive difference in People's lives.

Culbert Healthcare Solutions is a professional services firm serving healthcare organizations in the areas of operations management, revenue cycle, clinical transformation and information technology. I currently focus on recruitment for our Epic, Allscripts, and GE Practice. We are hiring! Please feel free to reach out in regards to career opportunities.
Vitalize Consulting Solutions, an SAIC company

Vitalize Consulting Solutions provides a wide variety of clinical, business and IT professional services to healthcare organizations. We provide these services in the areas of application implementation and enhancement, process optimization, interface development, project management, technology and integration, training and knowledge transfer. We seek to provide our clients with positive outcomes, for a predictable price through an effective blend of professional services and package solutions that address both tactical and strategic customer needs. Our success is a direct result of our focus to deliver quality services to our clients and our commitment to a team-oriented, supportive environment for our employees. Vitalize’s adage, “Strengthen Your Team with Ours”, demonstrates the importance we place on teamwork while working with our clients. Please learn more about us at www.getvitalized.com or email me at tim.bagg@getvitalized.com

Senior Manager of MSO -  Staff Augmentation
December 4, 2009, Keith worked with Tim in the same group

Keith is an exceptional recruiter who with only a year of experience, has become one of the best recruiters in the company.  Keith's tenacity and drive have accelerated him to being the #1 recruiter in the office over the past few months.  He is the type of person that believes he can work on any role, regardless of how specialized or challenging it may be. Time and time again Keith has provided quality candidates that lead to placements.  It's been a pleasure to work and watch Keith grow over the last year and I look forward to the coming year.

summary: Culbert Healthcare Solutions is a professional services firm serving integrated delivery networks, academic medical centers, hospitals and large group practices. We provide integrated & cohesive solutions across Management Consulting, Revenue Cycle and Information Technology to help healthcare organizations more effectively compete in the ever changing healthcare landscape.Our singular focus is to help our clients utilize best practices and technology to improve patient care, to enhance the patient experience, and to drive financial performance. Culbert’s IT consultants combine strong operations experience and multiple vendor certifications, which enable them to leverage advanced application functionality in order to optimize clinical and business operations and enhance informatics capabilities.
name: Tim Bagg
title: Finding top notch talent and business opportunities across the country at Culbert Healthcare Solutions
